q1: Did France deserve to win the World Cup?
a1: Absolutely, France had technique and was a well-oiled machine.
q2: Will France build on the world cup performance and win euro 2020 as well?
a2: I think France has a good chance at winning, but there are some other good teams as well.
q3: What about the World Cup winner's "curse" of not progressing past the group stages of the next tournament? Do you think France will break that streak?
q4: Why is France a better team than the others?
a4: They have a great team and manager, along with world class players.
a5: How many points got France this round?
